Potion, common
When you drink this potion, you transform into a black-feathered @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.d0prpsGSAorDadec]{owl} for 1 hour. This effect works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{polymorph} spell, except you can take only the form of an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.d0prpsGSAorDadec]{owl}. While you are in the form of an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.d0prpsGSAorDadec]{owl}, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.
If you are a druid with the Wild Shape feature, you can transform into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.VVXly3ue0i3YgGrB]{giant owl} instead. Drinking this potion doesnâ€™t expend a use of Wild Shape.
